channel.title: Touched: A Darkening Alley (May Tues)
channel.description:
This is for four May sessions of *Touched: A Darkening Alley*, a 1980s neo-magic setting for *The Sprawl*, mission-based cyberpunk, Powered by the Apocalypse. Attendance at all sessions is strongly encouraged, but not required. Rules will be taught, but familiarity with PbtA will be helpful. In session one we will create our characters, develop our corporate masters, and send you out on a mission.
***It’s now 1985***
***A Darkening Alley*** is a low-magic setting for *The Sprawl* . Weird, magical rifts are starting to crack open and humanity is beginning to feel the effects. Strange happenings are becoming more and more common. The street-side prophets are starting to sound a bit reasonable. The corporations smell power and have started pouring a lot of money into investigating and documenting these occurrences— that’s where you come in.
We will be using Zoom for our sessions. I’ll email all players about a week before the first session with the necessary links. Sessions will run up to three hours. We will plan to record, but I will confirm this with the players. [The Gauntlet Code of Conduct](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html) will be in play and we will use Lines and Veils and the [X-Card](http://tinyurl.com/x-card-rpg) for safety tools.
If you sign up and your availability changes, please remember to drop from the site and give me a heads up.
[date=2020-05-05 time=20:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2020-05-05 time=20:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 1 (https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M1pcV0A3Ut9M06waY8S)]
[date=2020-05-12 time=20:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2020-05-12 time=20:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 2 (https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M1pdGmL_lPJm-qU43rQ)]
[date=2020-05-19 time=20:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2020-05-19 time=20:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 3 (https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M1pdnMWb0i69bH_Y8Uy)]
[date=2020-05-26 time=20:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2020-05-26 time=20:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 4 (https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M1peIJdyKH7vrB1GEoi)] ![TOUCHED PRIME copy|511x500, 75%](upload://xyDZcclmqZyIDsmYbBYO25NF5rI.jpeg)
